Brief Introduction to Ontologies

by Zi Lin
September 21, 2017

Have you ever heard of WordNet, HowNet, FrameNet and ConceptNet? There are different kinds of ontologies towards lexicon, syntax and commonsense knowledge.

I have made a slides helping you to learn something about them, click here if you are interested!
